page.title: 10SCHOOLS, FAIRLIGHT, E.SUSSEX
page.content:
Guestling-Bradshaw Primary School has 206 pupils on roll approximately.
At ll years the children transfer to either Hillcrest Comprehensive School in Hastings or Thomas Peacocke Comprehensive School in Rye, E. Sussex
Hillcrest has ll60 pupils on roll. The day starts at 8.55am and ends at 4pm. The school takes children from ll to l8 years of age, both boys and girls.
Many of the children have to travel to school by bus as they live so far away. Parents of children at the primary school often take them by car. Both schools have active Parent-Teacher Associations to support the schools by raising funds.
